title: Деконструкция
overview: An educational online project of the Prodvizhenie TV channel and the Kino-Teatr.Ru website about how the past is depicted in real cinema and what place a work of art occupied in the context of its time. From classics to modern cinema, from epic films to TV series. The experts of "Deconstruction" - historians, reenactors, writers and journalists - will take each film apart and leave no stone unturned to find historical truth and fiction
